siteMetadata.title: Youtube 热门
siteMetadata.author: Buzzing.cc
siteMetadata.description: 用中文浏览 Youtube 上的全球热门视频

blogPost.excerpt:
How does order spontaneously arise out of chaos? This video is sponsored by Kiwico — go to https://www.kiwico.com/Veritasium50 for 50% off your first month of any crate.

An enormous thanks to Prof. Steven Strogatz — this video would not have been possible without him. Much of the script-writing was inspired and informed by his wonderful book Sync, and his 2004 TED talk. He is a giant in this field, and has literally written the book on chaos, complexity, and synchronization. It was hard to find a paper in this field that Steven (or one of his students) didn't contribute to. His Podcast "The Joy of X" is wonderful — please listen and subscribe wherever you get your podcasts https://www.quantamagazine.org/tag/the-joy-of-x

Nicky Case's Amazing Firefly Interactive — https://ncase.me/fireflies

Great Kuramoto Model Interactive — https://www.complexity-explorables.org/explorables/ride-my-kuramotocycle

References: 

Strogatz, S. H. (2012). Sync: How order emerges from chaos in the universe, nature, and daily life. Hachette UK. — https://ve42.co/Sync

Strogatz, S. H. (2000). From Kuramoto to Crawford: exploring the onset of synchronization in populations of coupled oscillators. Physica D: Nonlinear Phenomena, 143(1-4), 1-20. — https://ve42.co/Strogatz2000

Goldsztein, G. H., Nadeau, A. N., & Strogatz, S. H. (2021). Synchronization of clocks and metronomes: A perturbation analysis based on multiple timescales. Chaos: An Interdisciplinary Journal of Nonlinear Science, 31(2), 023109. — https://ve42.co/Goldsztein

The Broughton Suspension Bridge and the Resonance Disaster — https://ve42.co/Broughton

Bennett, M., Schatz, M. F., Rockwood, H., & Wiesenfeld, K. (2002). Huygens's clocks. Proceedings of the Royal Society of London. Series A: Mathematical, Physical and Engineering Sciences, 458(2019), 563-579. — https://ve42.co/Bennett2002

Pantaleone, J. (2002). Synchronization of metronomes. American Journal of Physics, 70(10), 992-1000. — https://ve42.co/Pantaleone2002

Kuramoto, Y. (1975). Self-entrainment of a population of coupled non-linear oscillators. In International symposium on mathematical problems in theoretical physics (pp. 420-422). Springer, Berlin, Heidelberg. -- https://ve42.co/Kuramoto1975

Great video by Minute Earth about Tidal Locking and the Moon — https://ve42.co/MinuteEarth

Strogatz, S. H., Abrams, D. M., McRobie, A., Eckhardt, B., & Ott, E. (2005). Crowd synchrony on the Millennium Bridge. Nature, 438(7064), 43-44. — https://ve42.co/Strogatz2005

Zhabotinsky, A. M. (2007). Belousov-zhabotinsky reaction. Scholarpedia, 2(9), 1435. — https://ve42.co/Zhabotinsky2007

Flavio H Fenton et al. (2008) Cardiac arrhythmia. Scholarpedia, 3(7):1665. — https://ve42.co/Cardiac

Cherry, E. M., & Fenton, F. H. (2008). Visualization of spiral and scroll waves in simulated and experimental cardiac tissue. New Journal of Physics, 10(12), 125016. — https://ve42.co/Cherry2008

Tyson, J. J. (1994). What everyone should know about the Belousov-Zhabotinsky reaction. In Frontiers in mathematical biology (pp. 569-587). Springer, Berlin, Heidelberg. — https://ve42.co/Tyson1994

Winfree, A. T. (2001). The geometry of biological time (Vol. 12). Springer Science & Business Media. — https://ve42.co/Winfree2001

Special thanks to Patreon supporters: Mac Malkawi, Oleksii Leonov, Michael Schneider, Jim Osmun, Tyson McDowell, Ludovic Robillard, jim buckmaster, fanime96, Juan Benet, Ruslan Khroma, Robert Blum, Richard Sundvall, Lee Redden, Vincent, Lyvann Ferrusca, Alfred Wallace, Arjun Chakroborty, Joar Wandborg, Clayton Greenwell, Pindex, Michael Krugman, Cy 'kkm' K'Nelson, Sam Lutfi, Ron Neal

Written by Derek Muller and Petr Lebedev
Animation by Fabio Albe
gfx and 3D animation by Jonny Hyman
Filmed by Derek Muller and Raquel Nuno
Edited by Derek Muller
Additional video supplied by Getty Images
Thumbnail by Ignat Berbeci

More footage from NASA's Scientific Visualization Studio

100 metronome video from https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=suxu1bmPm2g

Intro animation by Jorge Cham

Thanks for the BZ footage from SteinbockGroup: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=IJn1ssZEyns and 
NileRed https://youtu.be/LL3kVtc-4vY

Animation of waves in the heart from The Virtual Heart/ EM Cherry/ FH Fenton — https://ve42.co/Cardiac and https://ve42.co/Cherry2008

Chemical materials and protocol provided by Mike Morris and the UCI Chemistry Outreach Program https://www.chem.uci.edu/~jsnowick/outreach/UCI_Outreach/index.html

Thanks to Alie Ward for title/thumbnail consultation
Thanks to Dr Juliette Becker and Dr James O'Donoghue for the planetary science help

Music from Jonny Hyman, Epidemic Sound https://epidemicsound.com "Seaweed" "Deeper Than The Ocean" "Ripple Effect"
Music also from Artlist https://artlist.com "Children of Mystery"

Thumbnail by Ignat Berbeci
blogPost.body:
How does order spontaneously arise out of chaos? This video is sponsored by Kiwico — go to https://www.kiwico.com/Veritasium50 for 50% off your first month of any crate.

An enormous thanks to Prof. Steven Strogatz — this video would not have been possible without him. Much of the script-writing was inspired and informed by his wonderful book Sync, and his 2004 TED talk. He is a giant in this field, and has literally written the book on chaos, complexity, and synchronization. It was hard to find a paper in this field that Steven (or one of his students) didn't contribute to. His Podcast "The Joy of X" is wonderful — please listen and subscribe wherever you get your podcasts https://www.quantamagazine.org/tag/the-joy-of-x

Nicky Case's Amazing Firefly Interactive — https://ncase.me/fireflies

Great Kuramoto Model Interactive — https://www.complexity-explorables.org/explorables/ride-my-kuramotocycle

References: 

Strogatz, S. H. (2012). Sync: How order emerges from chaos in the universe, nature, and daily life. Hachette UK. — https://ve42.co/Sync

Strogatz, S. H. (2000). From Kuramoto to Crawford: exploring the onset of synchronization in populations of coupled oscillators. Physica D: Nonlinear Phenomena, 143(1-4), 1-20. — https://ve42.co/Strogatz2000

Goldsztein, G. H., Nadeau, A. N., & Strogatz, S. H. (2021). Synchronization of clocks and metronomes: A perturbation analysis based on multiple timescales. Chaos: An Interdisciplinary Journal of Nonlinear Science, 31(2), 023109. — https://ve42.co/Goldsztein

The Broughton Suspension Bridge and the Resonance Disaster — https://ve42.co/Broughton

Bennett, M., Schatz, M. F., Rockwood, H., & Wiesenfeld, K. (2002). Huygens's clocks. Proceedings of the Royal Society of London. Series A: Mathematical, Physical and Engineering Sciences, 458(2019), 563-579. — https://ve42.co/Bennett2002

Pantaleone, J. (2002). Synchronization of metronomes. American Journal of Physics, 70(10), 992-1000. — https://ve42.co/Pantaleone2002

Kuramoto, Y. (1975). Self-entrainment of a population of coupled non-linear oscillators. In International symposium on mathematical problems in theoretical physics (pp. 420-422). Springer, Berlin, Heidelberg. -- https://ve42.co/Kuramoto1975

Great video by Minute Earth about Tidal Locking and the Moon — https://ve42.co/MinuteEarth

Strogatz, S. H., Abrams, D. M., McRobie, A., Eckhardt, B., & Ott, E. (2005). Crowd synchrony on the Millennium Bridge. Nature, 438(7064), 43-44. — https://ve42.co/Strogatz2005

Zhabotinsky, A. M. (2007). Belousov-zhabotinsky reaction. Scholarpedia, 2(9), 1435. — https://ve42.co/Zhabotinsky2007

Flavio H Fenton et al. (2008) Cardiac arrhythmia. Scholarpedia, 3(7):1665. — https://ve42.co/Cardiac

Cherry, E. M., & Fenton, F. H. (2008). Visualization of spiral and scroll waves in simulated and experimental cardiac tissue. New Journal of Physics, 10(12), 125016. — https://ve42.co/Cherry2008

Tyson, J. J. (1994). What everyone should know about the Belousov-Zhabotinsky reaction. In Frontiers in mathematical biology (pp. 569-587). Springer, Berlin, Heidelberg. — https://ve42.co/Tyson1994

Winfree, A. T. (2001). The geometry of biological time (Vol. 12). Springer Science & Business Media. — https://ve42.co/Winfree2001

Special thanks to Patreon supporters: Mac Malkawi, Oleksii Leonov, Michael Schneider, Jim Osmun, Tyson McDowell, Ludovic Robillard, jim buckmaster, fanime96, Juan Benet, Ruslan Khroma, Robert Blum, Richard Sundvall, Lee Redden, Vincent, Lyvann Ferrusca, Alfred Wallace, Arjun Chakroborty, Joar Wandborg, Clayton Greenwell, Pindex, Michael Krugman, Cy 'kkm' K'Nelson, Sam Lutfi, Ron Neal

Written by Derek Muller and Petr Lebedev
Animation by Fabio Albe
gfx and 3D animation by Jonny Hyman
Filmed by Derek Muller and Raquel Nuno
Edited by Derek Muller
Additional video supplied by Getty Images
Thumbnail by Ignat Berbeci

More footage from NASA's Scientific Visualization Studio

100 metronome video from https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=suxu1bmPm2g

Intro animation by Jorge Cham

Thanks for the BZ footage from SteinbockGroup: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=IJn1ssZEyns and 
NileRed https://youtu.be/LL3kVtc-4vY

blogPost.title: The Secret of Synchronization
blogPost.author: Veritasium

localize.title: 同步化的秘密
localize.description:
秩序是如何从混乱中自发产生的？这个视频是由Kiwico赞助的--去https://www.kiwico.com/Veritasium50，任何箱子的第一个月都可以享受50%的折扣。

非常感谢Steven Strogatz教授--没有他就不可能有这个视频。大部分的剧本创作都是受到他的精彩著作《同步》和2004年TED演讲的启发和启发。他是这个领域的巨人，他确实写了一本关于混沌、复杂性和同步的书。在这个领域，很难找到一篇Steven（或他的学生）没有贡献的论文。他的播客 "The Joy of X "非常精彩--请在任何地方收听和订阅你的播客https://www.quantamagazine.org/tag/the-joy-of-x。

尼基-凯斯的神奇萤火虫互动 - https://ncase.me/fireflies

大仓本模型互动 - https://www.complexity-explorables.org/explorables/ride-my-kuramotocycle

参考文献。

Strogatz, S. H. (2012). Sync: How order emerges from chaos in the universe, nature, and daily life. Hachette UK. - https://ve42.co/Sync

Strogatz, S. H. (2000)。从Kuramoto到Crawford：探索耦合振荡器群体中的同步化开始。Physica D: Nonlinear Phenomena, 143(1-4), 1-20. - https://ve42.co/Strogatz2000

Goldsztein, G. H., Nadeau, A. N., & Strogatz, S. H. (2021). 时钟和节拍器的同步。基于多个时间尺度的扰动分析。Chaos: An Interdisciplinary Journal of Nonlinear Science, 31(2), 023109. - https://ve42.co/Goldsztein

布劳顿吊桥与共振灾难 - https://ve42.co/Broughton

Bennett, M., Schatz, M. F., Rockwood, H., & Wiesenfeld, K. (2002)。惠更斯的时钟。伦敦皇家学会论文集》。A系列：数学、物理和工程科学，458（2019），563-579。- https://ve42.co/Bennett2002

Pantaleone, J.（2002年）。节拍器的同步化。美国物理学杂志，70（10），992-1000。- https://ve42.co/Pantaleone2002

Kuramoto, Y. (1975). 耦合非线性振荡器群体的自诱导。In International symposium on mathematical problems in theoretical physics (pp. 420-422). Springer, Berlin, Heidelberg. Springer, Berlin, Heidelberg. -- https://ve42.co/Kuramoto1975

Minute Earth关于潮汐锁定和月球的精彩视频--https://ve42.co/MinuteEarth。

Strogatz, S. H., Abrams, D. M., McRobie, A., Eckhardt, B., & Ott, E. (2005). 千年桥上的人群同步。自然》，438（7064），43-44。- https://ve42.co/Strogatz2005

Zhabotinsky, A. M. (2007年)。Belousov-zhabotinsky反应。学术百科，2(9)，1435。- https://ve42.co/Zhabotinsky2007。

Flavio H Fenton等（2008）心律失常。学术百科，3（7）：1665。- https://ve42.co/Cardiac

Cherry, E. M., & Fenton, F. H. (2008). 模拟和实验心脏组织中螺旋波和涡旋波的可视化。新物理学杂志，10(12)，125016。- https://ve42.co/Cherry2008

Tyson, J. J. (1994)。每个人都应该知道的Belousov-Zhabotinsky反应。In Frontiers in mathematical biology (pp. 569-587). Springer, Berlin, Heidelberg. Springer, Berlin, Heidelberg. - https://ve42.co/Tyson1994

Winfree, A. T. (2001)。The geometry of biological time（Vol.12）。Springer Science & Business Media. - https://ve42.co/Winfree2001

特别感谢Patreon的支持者。Mac Malkawi, Oleksii Leonov, Michael Schneider, Jim Osmun, Tyson McDowell, Ludovic Robillard, jim Buckmaster, fanime96, Juan Benet, Ruslan Khroma, Robert Blum, Richard Sundvall, Lee Redden, Vincent, Lyvann Ferrusca, Alfred Wallace, Arjun Chakroborty, Joar Wandborg, Clayton Greenwell, Pindex, Michael Krugman, Cy 'kkm' K'Nelson, Sam Lutfi, Ron Neal.

作者：Derek Muller和Petr Lebedev。
动画：法比奥-阿尔贝
Gfx和3D动画：Jonny Hyman
拍摄者：Derek Muller和Raquel Nuno。
编辑：Derek Muller
附加视频由Getty Images提供
缩略图：Ignat Berbeci

美国宇航局科学可视化工作室的更多镜头。

100节拍器视频来自https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=suxu1bmPm2g

介紹動畫：Jorge Cham

感谢SteinbockGroup提供的BZ素材：https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=IJn1ssZEyns 和。
NileRed https://youtu.be/LL3kVtc-4vY

虚拟心脏的波浪动画/ EM Cherry/ FH Fenton - https://ve42.co/Cardiac 和 https://ve42.co/Cherry2008。

化学材料和协议由Mike Morris和UCI化学外联项目提供https://www.chem.uci.edu/~jsnowick/outreach/UCI_Outreach/index.html。

感谢Alie Ward提供的标题/缩略图咨询。
感谢Juliette Becker博士和James O'Donoghue博士的行星科学帮助。

音乐来自Jonny Hyman, Epidemic Sound https://epidemicsound.com "Seaweed""Deeper Than The Ocean""Ripple Effect"
音乐也来自艺人https://artlist.com "神秘的孩子"

缩略图：Ignat Berbeci

localize.title: 同步化的祕密
localize.description:
秩序是如何從混亂中自發產生的？這個視頻是由Kiwico贊助的--去https://www.kiwico.com/Veritasium50，任何箱子的第一個月都可以享受50%的折扣。

非常感謝Steven Strogatz教授--沒有他就不可能有這個視頻。大部分的劇本創作都是受到他的精彩著作《同步》和2004年TED演講的啓發和啓發。他是這個領域的巨人，他確實寫了一本關於混沌、複雜性和同步的書。在這個領域，很難找到一篇Steven（或他的學生）沒有貢獻的論文。他的播客 "The Joy of X "非常精彩--請在任何地方收聽和訂閱你的播客https://www.quantamagazine.org/tag/the-joy-of-x。

尼基-凱斯的神奇螢火蟲互動 - https://ncase.me/fireflies

大倉本模型互動 - https://www.complexity-explorables.org/explorables/ride-my-kuramotocycle

參考文獻。

Strogatz, S. H. (2012). Sync: How order emerges from chaos in the universe, nature, and daily life. Hachette UK. - https://ve42.co/Sync

Strogatz, S. H. (2000)。從Kuramoto到Crawford：探索耦合振盪器羣體中的同步化開始。Physica D: Nonlinear Phenomena, 143(1-4), 1-20. - https://ve42.co/Strogatz2000

Goldsztein, G. H., Nadeau, A. N., & Strogatz, S. H. (2021). 時鐘和節拍器的同步。基於多個時間尺度的擾動分析。Chaos: An Interdisciplinary Journal of Nonlinear Science, 31(2), 023109. - https://ve42.co/Goldsztein

布勞頓吊橋與共振災難 - https://ve42.co/Broughton

Bennett, M., Schatz, M. F., Rockwood, H., & Wiesenfeld, K. (2002)。惠更斯的時鐘。倫敦皇家學會論文集》。A系列：數學、物理和工程科學，458（2019），563-579。- https://ve42.co/Bennett2002

Pantaleone, J.（2002年）。節拍器的同步化。美國物理學雜誌，70（10），992-1000。- https://ve42.co/Pantaleone2002

Kuramoto, Y. (1975). 耦合非線性振盪器羣體的自誘導。In International symposium on mathematical problems in theoretical physics (pp. 420-422). Springer, Berlin, Heidelberg. Springer, Berlin, Heidelberg. -- https://ve42.co/Kuramoto1975

Minute Earth關於潮汐鎖定和月球的精彩視頻--https://ve42.co/MinuteEarth。

Strogatz, S. H., Abrams, D. M., McRobie, A., Eckhardt, B., & Ott, E. (2005). 千年橋上的人羣同步。自然》，438（7064），43-44。- https://ve42.co/Strogatz2005

Zhabotinsky, A. M. (2007年)。Belousov-zhabotinsky反應。學術百科，2(9)，1435。- https://ve42.co/Zhabotinsky2007。

Flavio H Fenton等（2008）心律失常。學術百科，3（7）：1665。- https://ve42.co/Cardiac

Cherry, E. M., & Fenton, F. H. (2008). 模擬和實驗心臟組織中螺旋波和渦旋波的可視化。新物理學雜誌，10(12)，125016。- https://ve42.co/Cherry2008

Tyson, J. J. (1994)。每個人都應該知道的Belousov-Zhabotinsky反應。In Frontiers in mathematical biology (pp. 569-587). Springer, Berlin, Heidelberg. Springer, Berlin, Heidelberg. - https://ve42.co/Tyson1994

Winfree, A. T. (2001)。The geometry of biological time（Vol.12）。Springer Science & Business Media. - https://ve42.co/Winfree2001

特別感謝Patreon的支持者。Mac Malkawi, Oleksii Leonov, Michael Schneider, Jim Osmun, Tyson McDowell, Ludovic Robillard, jim Buckmaster, fanime96, Juan Benet, Ruslan Khroma, Robert Blum, Richard Sundvall, Lee Redden, Vincent, Lyvann Ferrusca, Alfred Wallace, Arjun Chakroborty, Joar Wandborg, Clayton Greenwell, Pindex, Michael Krugman, Cy 'kkm' K'Nelson, Sam Lutfi, Ron Neal.

作者：Derek Muller和Petr Lebedev。
動畫：法比奧-阿爾貝
Gfx和3D動畫：Jonny Hyman
拍攝者：Derek Muller和Raquel Nuno。
編輯：Derek Muller
附加視頻由Getty Images提供
縮略圖：Ignat Berbeci

美國宇航局科學可視化工作室的更多鏡頭。

100節拍器視頻來自https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=suxu1bmPm2g

介紹動畫：Jorge Cham

感謝SteinbockGroup提供的BZ素材：https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=IJn1ssZEyns 和。
NileRed https://youtu.be/LL3kVtc-4vY

虛擬心臟的波浪動畫/ EM Cherry/ FH Fenton - https://ve42.co/Cardiac 和 https://ve42.co/Cherry2008。

化學材料和協議由Mike Morris和UCI化學外聯項目提供https://www.chem.uci.edu/~jsnowick/outreach/UCI_Outreach/index.html。

感謝Alie Ward提供的標題/縮略圖諮詢。
感謝Juliette Becker博士和James O'Donoghue博士的行星科學幫助。

音樂來自Jonny Hyman, Epidemic Sound https://epidemicsound.com "Seaweed""Deeper Than The Ocean""Ripple Effect"
音樂也來自藝人https://artlist.com "神祕的孩子"

縮略圖：Ignat Berbeci
